  • Uses of FormatterOptionsPanel in de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter

    Methods in de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter that return FormatterOptionsPanel 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    FormatterOptionsPanel FormatterService.createOptionsPanel​(Project project)
    Creates and returns the FormatterOptionsPanel for this formatter which will be displayed in the overall options dialog underneath this formatters selection.
